EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451 Spring Cloud Data Flow_Q117.Confirmation-451 Spri
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Spring Cloud Data Flow for Continuous Data Processing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Spring Cloud Data Flow for Continuous Data Processing. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore ways to extend concepts that enable continuous integration and delivery to developing, deploying, and managing data integration pipelines.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of interest:
- Analyst Report: Spring Boot Simplifies End-to-End Development <[[https://pivotal.io/spring-boot-simplifies-end-to-end-development]]>
- Blog: Building Flexible Data Pipelines with Spring Cloud Data Flow for PCF <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-flexible-data-pipelines-with-spring-cloud-data-flow-for-pcf]]> - Blog: Opening Doors with Spring Boot 2.0 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/opening-doors-with-spring-boot-2-0]]>
- Blog: Messaging Patterns for Event-Driven Microservices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native/messaging-patterns-for-event-driven-microservices]]> - Video: Orchestrate All the Things! with Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://spring.io/blog/2017/02/13/springone-platform-2016-replay-orchestrate-all-the-things-with-spring-cloud-data-flow]]>
- Video: Data Microservices in the Cloud <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-T-0WdZ3Sk&list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx&index=175]]>
- Video: Cloud Native Streaming and Event-Driven Microservices <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iel2Q6ZgZr4&list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
